source: Update the Databasename with your Dataverse Databasename.
Identify revenue distribution from leads, opportunities, and accounts with matplotlib.

%%pyspark
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
#Get the Data
df = spark.sql("""
    SELECT revenue, 'account' as source FROM account UNION
    SELECT revenue, 'lead' as source FROM lead UNION 
    SELECT totalamount_base, 'opportunity' as source FROM opportunity
""")
#Summarize the Data
pdf = df.toPandas()
revenue_data = pdf.groupby("source")[["revenue"]].sum()
#Format the Plot
my_colors = ['green','red', 'yellow']

plt.pie(revenue_data["revenue"], labels = revenue_data.index, autopct = '%1.1f%%', colors = my_colors)
plt.show()
Display potential revenue from leads and opportunities on a quarterly basis.

%%pyspark
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
#Get the Leads Data
df = spark.sql("""
    SELECT revenue, purchasetimeframe, 'lead' as source FROM lead
""")
#Summarize the Data
pdf = df.toPandas()
data = pdf.groupby(['purchasetimeframe'])[['revenue']].sum()

plt.bar(data.index, data["revenue"], color = "blue", label = "Lead")
#Get the Opportunity Data
df = spark.sql("""
    SELECT totalamount_base, purchasetimeframe, 'opportunity' as source FROM opportunity
""")
#Summairze the Data
pdf = df.toPandas()
data = pdf.groupby(["purchasetimeframe"])[["totalamount_base"]].sum()

plt.bar(data.index, data["totalamount_base"], color = "orange", label = "Opportunity")
#Format the Plot
plt.xticks(ticks=[-1, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4], labels=["", "Q1", "Q2", "Q3", "Q4", "This Year"])
plt.yticks(ticks= [0.e+00, 2.e+07, 4.e+07, 6.e+07, 8.e+07, 1.e+08], labels=["$0", "$20M", "$40M", "$60M", "$80M", "$100M"])
plt.legend()
plt.show()
Identify the contact information for each account by joining the Dataverse tables into a new Spark Table

%%pyspark
#Join Datasets
df = spark.sql("""
 SELECT a.Id AS account_ID, a.name AS account_name, b.fullname AS contact_name, b.emailaddress1 AS contact_email, b.donotemail
 FROM
 dataverse_salestrial_unqf701ccb0df97422f9db2220d5d6bf.account a
 INNER JOIN
 (
     SELECT parentcustomerid, fullname, emailaddress1, donotemail
     FROM 
     dataverse_salestrial_unqf701ccb0df97422f9db2220d5d6bf.contact
) b
ON a.Id = b.parentcustomerid
""")

#Write Joined Dataset to Spark Table
df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable("default.AccountEmails")

#Read the Spark Table
display(df)
